submapp.hmm.Hmm.smooth_transitions¶

Hmm.smooth_transitions(sigma: float, distance_matrix: numpy.ndarray = None) → None¶

Penalize (i.e decrease probability) long distance transitions

Parameters

  • sigma (float) – radius of the neighbouring function

  • distance_matrix (np.ndarray[float], shape = ( n_dis, n_dis)) – Matrix of relative distance between each class in the SOM This matrix defines the “shape” of the SOM (eg. hexagonal, rectangular) and should be the same as the one used in the SOM!

Return type

None

See also

  • neighborhood
